content: Follow the path all the way along and onto the snowy hillside. You will loop back into another cave and see a Buddha head at the top of a small staircase. Interact with it to get the Skandha of Thought.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Thought.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Thought'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the path all the way along and onto the snowy hillside. You will loop back into another cave and see a Buddha head at the top of a small staircase. Interact with it to get the Skandha of Thought.
